name: @commercetools/sdk-auth
description: Auth module for different authentication flows of commercetools platform API
author: Jan Juna <jan.juna-ext@commercetools.com> (https://github.com/junajan)

scripts.build: cross-env npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min && npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f umd -n CommercetoolsSdkAuth -i src/index.js -o dist/commercetools-sdk-auth.umd.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f umd -n CommercetoolsSdkAuth -i src/index.js -o dist/commercetools-sdk-auth.umd.min.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f es -n CommercetoolsSdkAuth -i src/index.js -o dist/commercetools-sdk-auth.es.js
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f cjs -n CommercetoolsSdkAuth -i src/index.js -o dist/commercetools-sdk-auth.cjs.js
